Execute program: Not part of the language standard. Commonly done by compiler provided packages or by interfacing to C or POSIX.[15]

Replace current program with new execute: exec.Run(path, argv, envv, dir, exec.DevNull, exec.DevNull, exec.DevNull)

Execute program: Sys.command command, Unix.open_process_full command env (stdout, stdin, stderr),...
Replace current program with new execute: Unix.create_process prog args new_stdin new_stdout new_stderr, ...

Execute program: system(command) or $output = `command` or exec(command) or passthru(command)
CALL EXECUTE_COMMAND_LINE (COMMAND «, WAIT» «, EXITSTAT» «, CMDSTAT» «, CMDMSG») Fortran 2008[a]
